item.title: About
item.description: Hi 👋 my name is Sajjad! co-founder of karjoo.plus, open-source enthusiasm, full-stack Programmer, Security researcher. My Areas of interest 👨‍💻 Programming 👨‍🔬 Research and Development 👨‍🔧 Server Administration 👀 IT Security My Experiences JavaScript & TypeScript thousands of hours React & React Native thousands of hours PHP & MySQL thousands of hours GraphQL hundreds of hours Golang hundreds of hours PostgreSQL & PL/pgSQL tens of hours Linux Server Administration thousands of hours IT Security and Penetration thousands of hours Docker tens of hours Please feel free to ping me at hi@hashemian.
